Class Tools

java.lang.Object
bartMachine.Tools
public class Tools extends Object
A class that contains many generally useful convenience methods.

      public static String StringJoin(ArrayList all, String joinby)

      Parameters:
      all - the collection of substrings

      Returns:
      the final product: str1 + joinby + str2 + . . . + strN

      public static int[] binary_add_arrays(int[] arr1, int[] arr2)
      Adds one array to another after first converting each addend to binary (1 if the value > 0, 0 otherwise)
      Parameters:
      arr1 - The array of first addends
      arr2 - The array of seconds addends
      Returns:
